price: que tienen temor del castigo de su Señor,
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna hum min ʿadhābi rabbihim mush'fiqūna
